So many comments about how "trashy" the Essential Phone is... As an owner of this phone, I don't see how people can be so picky about it.. And all the things that people are trash talking are such excusable things: LCD screen not having the capabilities of AMOLED, Camera range getting a little dicey (Been fixed a little too), notch, no headphone jack? Really they're such minor inconveniences, if you even want to call them that.  It's a great phone, it feels premium, it's running next to stock Android, And it's got all the storage I can ever need. And the deal for it was killer.  If anything there are those few times when you're like "ugh where's my Bluetooth headphones?" but it's so minorly inconvenient.. not talking to anyone specifically, but people should grow up.

So what you're saying is... Don't break it, you dumb dumb.
